FAQ.title: The Commission
FAQ.description: There are some common questions which we get and their answers.

hourly-rate.question: What is the time prize for era services?
hourly-rate.answer: Our basic price is $120/hour. We also offer fixed prices for the project. If you are interested in a fast price, please contact us for an offer.

already-have-site.question: I already have a website, can I still use the services of the era?
already-have-site.answer: We can help you explore the best websites, we can help you with testing, security and implementation.

simple-issue.question: I just want to fix a problem, can you help me?
simple-issue.answer: It is up to us to assess that the problem is for the simple and outside our scope we will not be able to help you.

deploy-site.question: How quickly can I implement my website on the Internet?
deploy-site.answer: It is up to the men of an orderly structure to be on the places where we can implement the websites in a few hours, otherwise it can be in a few days.
